item.title: PyPHS Seminar
item.dc:creator: Antoine Falaize
item.description: Below is the video recording of a seminar I gave on December 2017 in which I present the concepts underlying the PyPHS Library. The talk is in french and the ￼slides are in English.

item.title: PyPHS Tutorial
item.dc:creator: Antoine Falaize
item.description: Below is the video recording of a hands on tutorial on PyPHS library I gave on December 2017. The talk is in french and the material (slides and Python scripts) are in English.

item.title: Analyse de SHP pour la génération de lois de commande par platitude différentielle
item.dc:creator: Antoine Falaize
item.description:
Below are the slides for the presentation I gave during the 2nd edition of the Journées Techniques de Contrôle en Vibrations, Acoustique et Musique (JTCVAM) (in french):

Analyse de Systèmes Hamiltoniens à Ports pour la génération de lois de commande par platitude différentielle: application en électroacoustique

item.title: Analog audio circuits
item.dc:creator: Antoine Falaize
item.description:
This is a companion page for the article Passive guaranteed simulation of analog audio circuits: A port-Hamiltonian approach submitted in may 2016 to the special issue Audio Signal Processing of journal Applied Science.
